Title: Shortcut to Happiness
Writer: Stephen Vincent Benet (story "The Devil and Daniel Webster"), Archibald Macleish (play), Peter Dexter (screen story), Peter Dexter (screenplay), Bill Condon (screenplay), Nancy Cassaro (screenplay)
Actors: Virl Andrick, Ray Aranha, Kaniel Arocho, Jorge Arocho
Plot: Down-and-out writer Jabez Stone (Producer and Director Alec Baldwin) sells his soul to The Devil (Jennifer Love Hewitt) in exchange for fame and fortune.
